title: Portland beef carcase competition 1960
brief_description: Promotional film highlighting the quality of Victorian beef. Shots of people looking at meat, etc throughout. Includes disturbing footage of beef carcases being hung. Great ‘The End’ title. See Also: 1955 Pig Carcase Competition at Dandenong and 1957 Pig Carcase Competition at Dandenong.
